name: Supernatural tab icons [Tumblr tab icons]
description: Replace the dashboard tab icons with Supernatural-themed icons. Impala for Home, John's journal for Inbox, the samulet for Explore, hex bag for Account, the rings of the horsemen for Help|XKit (XKit only). ("Explore. It's kind of like search, but for when you canâ€™t think of anything." Yes, Tumblr believes we're all brain-dead.)
additional_info: Icons are SPN dash thing by Brandt Young. (Thank you, Brandt Young.)

style_setting_options.label: Both the XKit and Help icons
